attributes.action: No discriminatory taxes/charges on diesel vehicles owned before legislation date
attributes.additional_details: Diesel engines were originally encouraged as being less harmful than petrol engines.
attributes.background: This is to avoid penalising those who bought diesel vehicles in the good faith that they were helping reduce pollution (now known to have been misled) and contributing to the economy.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking for any new legislation affecting diesel cars not to be retrospective.
